title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 701 - Classifications-surface Waters And Groundwaters
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 701 - Classifications-surface Waters And Groundwaters

State Regulations
§ 701.1 - General conditions applying to all water classifications

Fresh Surface Waters (§ 701.2 to 701.9)

Saline Surface Waters (§ 701.10 to 701.14)

Groundwaters (§ 701.15 to 701.18)

Discharge Restriction Categories (§ 701.19 to 701.24)

Trout Waters (§ 701.25 to 701.27)

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 6, ch. X, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 701

Statutory authority: Environmental Conservation Law, §§ 1-0101, 3-0301 [2][m], 15-0313, 17-0101, 17-0301, 17-0303, 17-0809

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
